item.title: OpenAIâ€™s agentic era begins: ChatGPT Tasks offers job scheduling, reminders and more
item.description: OpenAI will let some users schedule task reminders on ChatGPT, a sign the company may be readying itself to release an agent.

item.title: Cerebras Systems teams with Mayo Clinic on genomic model that predicts arthritis treatment
item.description: Cerebras Systems has teamed with Mayo Clinic to create an AI genomic foundation model that predicts the best medical treatments.

item.title: How HP sees the era of the AI PC | Alex Cho
item.description: PC makers are betting everything on the AI bandwagon. At the CES 2025 tech trade show in Las Vegas last week, AI technology was everywhere.

item.title: Imec spins out Vertical Compute memory chip firm in $20.5M deal
item.description: Europe's Imec.xpand is spinning out memory chip firm Vertical Compute in a seed investment round worth $20.5 million.

item.title: The U.S. unicorns most likely to go public in 2025 | NVCA/PitchBook
item.description: A raft of U.S. unicorns -- those valued at $1 billion or more -- are likely to go public in 2025, according to the PitchBook/NVCA.
